trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref:System.DateTime> objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: Gir et typen konverteringsprogram til å konvertere <xref:System.DateTime>objekter til og fra ulike representasjoner.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.DateTime> object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.DateTime>objektet til og fra en streng.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method uses the <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> method of the <xref:System.DateTime> class to convert from a string.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>metoden bruker den <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.DateTime>klassen for å konvertere fra en streng.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method uses the current culture, if a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is not supplied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>metoden bruker den gjeldende kulturen, hvis en <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>er ikke angitt.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Generally, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> uses the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A> property to format a date and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A> with the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortTimePattern%2A> property to format a date and time.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>bruker den <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A>til å formatere en dato og <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A>med den <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortTimePattern%2A>til å formatere dato og klokkeslett.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortTimePattern%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A> property is passed, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> uses yyyy-mm-dd to format a date and <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> to format a date and time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>egenskapen sendes, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>bruker åååå-mm-dd til å formatere en dato og <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>til å formatere dato og klokkeslett.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om typen konverteringsprogrammer i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basisklasse og [slik: implementere et konverteringsprogram av typen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of DateTimeConverter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du aldri må opprette en forekomst av DateTimeConverter.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: I stedet kalle <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>metoden for <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se eksemplene i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basistabellen klasse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DateTimeConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DateTimeConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a <xref:System.DateTime> using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt i den angitte kildetypen til en <xref:System.DateTime>ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.DateTime> to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.DateTime>til og fra en streng.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være `null`, så kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere fra.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt til den angitte måltypen ved hjelp av konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være `null`, så kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer gitt verdi-objekt til en <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.DateTime> to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.DateTime>til og fra en streng.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være `null`, så kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: An optional <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: En valgfri <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If not supplied, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, antas gjeldende kultur.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>til å konvertere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer det konverterte value .

trans-unit.source: value is not a valid value for the target type.
trans-unit.target: valueer ikke en gyldig verdi for måltypen.

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen kan ikke utføres.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to a <xref:System.DateTime> using the arguments.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer gitt verdi-objektet som en <xref:System.DateTime>ved hjelp av argumentene.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a <xref:System.DateTime> to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram kan bare konvertere en <xref:System.DateTime>til og fra en streng.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: Den `context` parameter kan brukes til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om denne konverteringsprogram aktiveres fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være `null`, så kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere `null`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: An optional <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: En valgfri <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If not supplied, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke angitt, antas gjeldende kultur.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>til å konvertere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>ikke konvertere verdien til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En som representerer det konverterte value .

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen kan ikke utføres.
